name: Tip-Toe Dungeon
description:
Tip-Toe Dungeon is a game about traversing a pitch-dark labyrinth, trying to find the path that you need to take, all the while rationing out how often you get to see the map around you. Look too much, and you'll be left in the dark. Look too little, and you might fall off of the map.

CONTROLS: WASD to move. Shift to turn on your light.
